Content.Knowledge Point: The importance of using your smartphone for content creation
Content.Text: As a small business owner, your smartphone is the best tool you have for creating content. It's portable, affordable, and accessible.

Content.Knowledge Point: Basic equipment for filming and editing
Content.Text: All you need is your phone and a tripod. I recommend the iPhone 13 Pro Max and two types of tripods: a classic bendy leg tripod and a portable extendable tripod.
Understand your environment and the direction your windows face to maximize natural lighting. Follow the sun and film during golden hour for the best results.
Editing is an essential part of content creation. It allows you to enhance your videos and make them more engaging. I use CapCut, an all-in-one editing app available for both Apple and Android users.
Start with a rough cut, which is the basic video without filters or text. Cut the video into tiny increments for a more interesting look.
Voiceovers and text are crucial for connecting with your audience. Use CapCut's AI script generator to help with writing scripts, and keep the font simple to avoid distractions.
Make minor color corrections to enhance the video's lighting. Then, export the video and post it on TikTok and Instagram.
